biotools.summary: A tool designed to jointly detect CNVs from WGS data in parent-offspring trios.  It models read depth signal with the negative binomial regression to accommodate over-dispersion and considered GC content and mappability bias.

bioschemas.name: TrioCNV
bioschemas.summary: A tool designed to jointly detect CNVs from WGS data in parent-offspring trios.  It models read depth signal with the negative binomial regression to accommodate over-dispersion and considered GC content and mappability bias.
